title: The Fine Art Of Pricing Detroit's Collection
teaser: With Detroit's bankruptcy trial underway, one point of contention is likely to be the value of the city's art collection. The art market can be unpredictable, and disagreements between appraisers and creditors reflect just how political Detroit's art has become.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
